item.title: New Media
item.description: This is a quick one - under media you can find WAY MORE stuff I did over the course of past few years.
item.content:
This is a quick one - under media you can find WAY MORE stuff I did over the course of past few years.

That said, if you feel like you need a producer or a session player - you know where to find me. And if not, then write to me at hello@akondas.com!!
